mapper.select: SELECT m.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_PASSWORD, a.ADDRESS_NUMBER as member_Address_Number, a.ZIP_CODE, a.ADDRESS, a.ADDRESS_DETAIL, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_GENDER, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, m.MEMBER_PHONE_NUMBER, ea.EXPERT_STATUS_NUMBER as EXPERT_CERT_STATUS_NUMBER, ea.EXPERT_APPLICANT_REASON, m.MEMBER_BIRTH_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER m JOIN TBL_ADDRESS a ON m.MEMBER_ADDRESS_NUMBER = a.ADDRESS_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_EXPERT_APPLICANT ea ON ea.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE m.Member_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}
